meta.title: Ward Khaddour | Full Stack Web Developer - Next.js, React, Nest.js
meta.description: Ward Khaddour is a full stack JavaScript developer specializing in React, Next.js, Nest.js, and modern web technologies. Portfolio, projects, and contact info.

about.name: Ward Khaddour
about.summary: A passionate full-stack developer with experience in building modern web applications. I love creating scalable and maintainable software, exploring new technologies, and solving challenging problems.

projects.description: A showcase of my recent work and development projects

flatlane.title: Flatlane
flatlane.shortDescription: Comprehensive ride-hailing platform with real-time tracking
details: Built a customer-facing web app with real-time trip tracking, ride booking, secure in-app chat, and a driver rating system.
Integrated Stripe and PayPal for secure payments, ensuring smooth and safe transactions.
Applied design patterns (Adapter, Observer) for modular, maintainable architecture
Developed an admin dashboard to monitor trips, manage drivers/customers, and track engagement metrics.

syrianlancer.title: Syrianlancer
syrianlancer.shortDescription: Freelancing platform for service seekers and freelancers
details: Created a platform for service seekers and freelancers with detailed service listings, search/filter options, and secure transactions.
Built a rating system to enhance trust and credibility.
Integrated secure payment gateway and delivery system to protect both parties.
Added real-time in-app chat for seamless communication.
Developed an admin dashboard for service/user management, dispute resolution, and analytics tracking.

edulive.title: Edulive
edulive.shortDescription: Real-time online classroom and course platform
details: Designed a platform with live classrooms (via WebRTC), recorded streaming (HLS/DASH), and adaptive playback for varied networks/devices.
Implemented Nest.js, GraphQL APIs, Socket.io, PostgreSQL, and React for a full-stack solution.
Built real-time signaling for video sessions and efficient querying for course data.

observerKit.title: React Intersection Observer Kit
observerKit.shortDescription: Custom React hooks for viewport tracking
details: Developed a lightweight, TypeScript-based library for using the Intersection Observer API in React.
Provided hooks for viewport entry/exit detection, real-time tracking, and custom visibility conditions.

skills.description: My toolkit for building amazing digital experiences

experienceList.description: Built and enhanced web applications for freelancing, ride-hailing, and medical platforms. Led real-time feature development, mentored interns, and optimized dashboards for usability and performance.
Contributed to an Agile project management system and course platform. Collaborated with UI/UX teams, integrated APIs, and was recognized as Employee of the Month.
Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and contributed to early-stage web projects under professional guidance.

educationList.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum focused on software engineering principles, design patterns, object-oriented programming, databases, algorithms, and data structures.
